sensors.selectASensor: No sensors selected. Are you sure you don't want to use one?
orientations.title: Orientations
luxes.title: Light levels
no.orientations.defined: You have no orientations defined for this app. Please, create at least one.
orientations.intructions: You have selected the Orientations sensor. Here, you should specify which values interests your application, so augmentations react to the changes involving those values.
url.selection: Navigate by uring the search box and, when you are in the Web page you want to select, click on the «Save» button at the bottom of this form.
context.values.help: Create the context values that should be of interest of your application. Such values will be later used for triggering the augmentations.
click.save.to.finish.the.app: Click «Finish» to complete the process or «Back» to continue editing the application.
finish.application: You have finished editing your app. It is available in the initial list of applications, in case you want to edit or share it.
augmentations.help: Create a new augmentation to match with the existing target Web apps. Augmentations will be executed when a new context value of interest (associated to one of the target Web apps) is perceived and notified to your application.
no.digital.counterpart: You have no target Web apps defined yet. Please, create at least one.
no.augmentation: You have no augmentations defined yet. Please, create at least one.
no.dc.property: You have no properties defined yet. Please, create at least one.
augmentation.setup.help: Name the augmentation and choose which target Web app will be associated to it. This means that every time you visit a URL matching one of those target Web apps' URLs, the augmentation will be presented to the user.
source.editor.description: Edit the source in the text area below, and then save it. Be careful.
source.editor.title: Source code editor
apps.management.title: MoWA Authoring
apps.management.description: Start by creating a new application or editing the saved ones
authored.apps.delete.msg: Do you really want to remove the app?
authored.apps.edit.msg: Be careful, this functionality is just for advanced users. Do you really want to edit the source code?
all.fields.required: All fields in this form are required
confirm.property.removal: Do you really want to delete this property?
extensible.apps.title: The kind of application  <i class='fa fa-info-circle fa-2'/>
extensible.apps.description: Create your custom application based on one of the following types
blank.property: Hey! don't forget to name this property
ask.follow.link: Do you want to follow the link?
sucessfully.saved.in.server: The application has been successfully exported. Thanks for participating!
error.saving.in.server: There was a problem while saving the data. Please, report this to the conductors of the experiment.
app.setup.title: Application setup
app.setup.description: Please, choose a name for your application
app.setup.name: Name
sensors.selection.description: Enable the sensors you want to use in your augmentations
not.well.configured.space: The selected context representation is not well configured. Please, check it and try again
outdoor.map.title: Outdoor Map configuration  <i class='fa fa-info-circle fa-2'/>
outdoor.map.description: Choose the starting map view for your application by selecting a default location and by setting a zoom level value
custom.map.title: Custom Map configuration
custom.map.description: Browse the Internet and choose a representative image of the physical space to be toured.
custom.map.georef.title: Image georeferencing
custom.map.georef.markers.exceeded:
Just two coordinates are needed.
Remove a POI or move one of them, please.
custom.map.invalid.image: Be careful. It seems like the URL you entered doesn't point to a valid image
localization.title: Location detection
localization.insert.poi: Do you want to create a POI in your current location?
localization.boundings.exceeded: You seem located outside the boundaries of the map
gps.location.title: GPS location configuration  <i class='fa fa-info-circle fa-2'/>
gps.location.description: The same position the POI has defined, will be used for physical sensing. You don't have to configure anything with this kind of sensing
sensors.qr.based.location.description: Please, point your camera to the QR code you want associate with the POI and then touch the live video player to decode it
pois.management.title: Management of Points of Interest  <i class='fa fa-info-circle fa-2'/>
pois.management.description: Create a new PDI by holding a position on the map. Then, hold a POI to access its editing options.
pois.connection.error.samepoi: A POI can not be origin and target at the same time
pois.connection.title: Connecting POIs
pois.connection.question: Two POIs has been selected. Do you want to connect them?
poi.config.title: Point of Interest  <i class='fa fa-info-circle fa-2'/>
poi.delete.msg: Do you really want to delete this POI?
poi.config.description: Complete the fields bearing in mind that this data can be used from augmenters. You can add your own customized properties by clicking «Configure properties».
poi.config.name: PoI name
poi.copy.augmenters.title: Copy from
poi.external.props.description: Create new properties by clicking on «New one». Then, give it a name and click «Select from Web» which lets you navigate and select content by holding any DOM element.
poi.extra.property.name: Property name
augmentation.layer.description: Create new augmenter thumbnails by clicking on the elements of the bottom bar of the screen. Then, position each one by pressing and holding any DOM element of the Web page, and choosing between options. Finally, use the editing options to configure, preview and/or remove them.
augmenter.configuration.title: Augmenter configuration  <i class='fa fa-info-circle fa-2'/>
augmenter.configuration.description: Complete the required fields for each augmenter whether entering text, linking a PDI property or by choosing from the available options, if any.
augmenter.removal.question: Are you sure you want to delete this augmenter?
augmenter.link.poi.property.description: Link the augmenter with some -application or POI- properties previously defined, by clicking on any of the listed options.
augmenter.unselected: You should select an augmenter first
augmenter.undefined.url: There's no URL defined to augment. Please, configure it and try again
remove.augmenter.question: Do you really want to remove this augmenter?
wrong.content.selection.title: Wrong content selection
wrong.content.selection.element: You can not position elements here. Please try into another element on the Web page
wrong.content.selection.notext: The element you selected doesn't contain text. Please, try another element
thumbnail.position.title: Thumbnail position in DOM
thumbnail.position.description: Choose values for positioning the thumbnail in the DOM. You can see a demo of positioning at the top of this form.
thumbnail.position.notpositioned: A thumbnail has not been positioned yet. Please, position that one before adding new ones
export.app.title: Export the application <i class='fa fa-info-circle fa-2'/>
export.app.description: Click «Export» to save and share your application.
clear.logs.question: Please, contact us for providing you the keyword to access this functionality
